channel.title: The Penalty Flag
channel.description: On "The Penalty Flag", Chris and Tony are going to be talking about the week that was, the week that will be, and every controversy on the gridiron. There may be some yelling involved and flags thrown. This isn’t your average sports debate show. The stakes have never been higher.
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Chris Ashe, Tony Smith

item.title: Week 7: Chasing The Top
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss if the Chiefs can make the playoffs, who can fix the Panthers, and the Bengals’ surprisingly hot start. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Week 6: King Henry Reclaims The Throne
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss the fourth down call for the Bills, is it panic time for the Browns, and is Trevon Diggs DPOY? All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Week 5: Missed Kicks, Comebacks, and a new Top QB?
item.description:
This week, Chris and Tony discuss if the Bengals are a legit threat to win the division, are the Chiefs a Top 3 team in the NFL anymore, and is Lamar Jackson a Top 5 QB in the NFL? All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/thepenaltyflagpodcast/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Week 4: Brady vs Belichick
item.description: This week, Chris and Tony discuss the future of the Steelers, the success of the Cardinals, and whether or not Brady finally faced his demons in Foxborough. All this and more, only on The Penalty Flag.

item.title: Introducing The Penalty Flag
item.description: On “The Penalty Flag”, Chris and Tony are going to be talking about the week that was, the week that will be, and every controversy on the gridiron. There may be some yelling involved and flags thrown. This isn’t your average sports debate show. The stakes have never been higher.
